arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: PSG play their first home fixture of the 2025/26 Ligue 1 season at the Parc des Princes against Angers on Friday evening. After a hard-fought win at Nantes last week, Luis Enrique’s side return to the capital determined to build on their positive start.
